title: Gallup Says Most Americans Support NRA, Despite Scrutiny After Recent Shooting
text:
Gallup Says Most Americans Support NRA, Despite Scrutiny After Recent Shooting 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
According to a Gallup survey released Thursday, 58 percent of Americans view the National Rifle Association favorably, despite a mass shooti... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
